title: Oranges and Lemons Say the Bells of St. Clements
description: An orange and a lemon tree laden with fruit are growing side by side. A group of children have formed a circle around citrus trees and are probably playing "Oranges and Lemons". Daisies are growing in the grass. Designed for Jeffrey and Co. of London. Now produced at the Sanderson mill from original rollers.
name: Sidewall
